chat_welcome: Welcome to Deepchat AI! Please enter your question or upload a file to start the conversation.
file_drop_area: Drag & drop files here or click to upload (PDF/Text, max 10MB)
note_wait_time: Please note: PDF processing may take a while depending on the file size and content complexity. Please be patient.
file_too_large: File too large, please upload a file smaller than 10MB
fail_to_replay: Unable to get complete reply, please try again
chat_expired: Chat expired, please log in again
unable_connect: Unable to connect to the server, please try again later
continue_deal: The system continues to process the PDF in the background, and you can reopen the chat later to view the results.
unable_display: Unable to display PDF content, content is empty
check_server: Unable to connect to the server, please check if the server is running properly
response_timeout: Response timed out, please try again or check the server status
api_unconnect:

system_initialization: System initialization in progress, please wait...
pdf_deal: The PDF processing result is not in the right format
unknown_deal: The PDF processing result is unknown, but there is no content to display
determined_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
confirm_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
